ConnectionStrings.IdentityConnection: Server=<localhost or another Mysql server name>;Database=<database name>;User Id=<user name>;Password=<password>;SslMode=none;
ConnectionStrings.DataConnection: Server=<localhost or another Mysql server name>;Database=<database name>;User Id=<user name>;Password=<password>;SslMode=none;
ConnectionStrings.KeysFolder: <Path to folder with keys storage (e.g. C:\Temp\keys)>
ConnectionStrings.Domain: <application startup domain name - 'localhost' or domain name with dot at the start e.g. '.example.com'>
ConnectionStrings.ClientName: <Any text word for compatibility with CPQ Manager>

ConfigSettings.DefaultUSR: <Default name for first user when create database>
ConfigSettings.CPQManagerLink: <Empty or CPQ Manager web address (e.g. https://cpq.example.com)>

LimitSettings.ExportExcel: true or false - allow or reject data export to Excel
LimitSettings.ExportSize: Limit number of rows when exporting to Excel (e.g. 500)
